name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Azure** cloud services and **CI/CD** automation. Expertise in **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform**, **Bicep**, and **ARM Templates** to streamline deployment processes. Proficient in **Azure DevOps**, **Azure Policy**, **Azure Monitor**, and **Application Insights** to ensure robust application performance and compliance. Hands-on experience with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, leveraging **Powershell** for automation tasks. Strong problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills facilitate effective teamwork and project success.

Extensive background in software development using **Python**, and modern frameworks including **React** and **Node.js**, coupled with practical experience in building secure and maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Passionate about utilizing technical expertise to drive real-world impact through efficient and innovative software practices.
